column4: hey anyone knows at what time the official release will be released?
sometime before friday, just wait till friday and you'll find it :P
what?   you took a plane over the behring strait? :P

ubuntu releases are meant to be scheduled about 6months you know, if you want the latest and newest, you will need a time-machine, otherwise, nevermind what version when, 10.04, 11 whatever, just get it whenever it 's out, it will be in less than 48hrs, so
